name: Multitask King
description:
Do you think you are good at simple games? And what about multitasking?

Let's test your skill and see how many games you can play at the same time!

Master 4 mini-games with increasing difficulty and become the Multitask King!

If you can get a score of 100 you are a multitasking gosu, if you get to 160 you truly are  a Multitask King.

Check the Instructions in game for controls. Fullscreen recommended.

Inspired by Multitask and Multitask2 by IcyLime, Hexagon, Egg and Arkanoid.
